monogr.author: Aeschylus
monogr.title: Aeschylus, with an English translation by Herbert Weir Smyth, Ph. D. in two volumes. 1.Suppliant Women

imprint.publisher: Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press; London, William Heinemann, Ltd.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
tagged corrupt words with the NOPARSE tag; see the text log for a list.  changed *afrodi/ths to *)afrodi/ths

$Log: aesch.supp_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.2  2010-06-24 15:41:00  gcrane
edits to improve named entities

Revision 1.1  2009/10/09 19:49:18  rsingh04
more reorganizing of texts module by collection

Revision 1.1  2009/10/07 20:59:53  rsingh04
began reorganizing texts module by collection.  created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files

Revision 1.3  2005/08/01 15:44:56  packel
really removed item tags

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 15:32:41  packel
removed stray item tags

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 14:27:32  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.8  2004/04/21 20:28:10  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.7  2003/07/01 22:14:26  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.6  2000/03/04 20:33:49  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.5  2000/02/17 17:46:03  amahoney
use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks;  put cards at ends of
such speeches after the close tag;  put sp and speaker tags on the divs
of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so
we lost the speaker info)

Revision 1.4  1999/12/23 18:19:40  amahoney
convert to P3

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ti/n' a)\n ou)=n xw/ran eu)/frona ma=llon
w)= po/lis, w)= gh=, kai\ leuko\n u(/dwr,
pri\n po/da xe/rsw| th= d' e)n a)sw/dei
pri/n pote le/ktrwn, w(=n qe/mis ei)/rgei,

l.#text: ta\ d' a)/elpta/ per o)/nta fanei=tai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ei) de\ kurei= tis pe/las oi)wnopo/lwn

l.#text: cunti/qhsi de\ paido\s mo/ron, w(s au)tofo/nws

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pi/ptei d' a)sfale\s ou)d' e)pi\ nw/tw|,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: qeoi=s d' e)nage/a te/lea pelome/nwn kalw=s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: qe/lousa d'   au)=  qe/lousan a(gna/  m'

sp.speaker: *danao/s

l.#text: pai=des, fronei=n xrh/:  cu\n fronou=nti d' h(/kete

l: pistw=| ge/ronti tw=| de nauklh/rw| patri/.
kai\ ta)pi\ xe/rsou nu=n promhqi/an labw\n
leu/ssw, cu\n i(/ppois kampu/lois t' o)xh/masin:
ta/x' a)\n pro\s h(ma=s th=sde gh=s a)rxhge/tai
a)ll' ei)/t' a)ph/mwn ei)/te kai\ teqhgme/nos
w)mh=| cu\n o)rgh=| to/nd' e)po/rnutai sto/lon,
a)/meino/n e)sti panto\s ei(/nek', w)= ko/rai,

l.#text: krei=sson de\ pu/rgou bwmo/s, a)/rrhkton sa/kos

l: a)ll' w(s ta/xista ba=te, kai\ leukostefei=s
ai)doi=a kai\ goedna\ kai\ zaxrei=' e)/ph
fqoggh=| d' e(pe/sqw prw=ta me\n to\ mh\ qrasu/,
to\ mh\ ma/taion d' e)k metwposwfro/nwn

l.#text: kai\ mh\ pro/lesxos mhd' e)folko\s e)n lo/gw|

l: ge/nh|. to\ th=|de ka/rt' e)pi/fqonon ge/nos.
me/mnhso d' ei)/kein: xrei=os ei)= ce/nh fuga/s.
qrasustomei=n ga\r ou) pre/pei tou\s h(/ssonas.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: i)/doito dh=ta preumenou=s a)p' o)/mmatos:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: qe/loim' a)\n h)/dh soi\ pe/las qro/nous e)/xein.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: mh/ nun sxo/laze, mhxanh=s d' e)/stw kra/tos.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: kei/nou qe/lontos eu)= teleuth/sei ta/de.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: kai\ *zhno\s o)/rnin to/nde nu=n kiklh/|skete.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kalou=men au)ga\s h(li/ou swthri/ous,

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: a(gno/n t' *)apo/llw, fuga/d' a)p' ou)ranou= qeo/n.

l.#text: ei)dw\s a)\n ai)=san th/nde suggnoi/h brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: suggnoi=to dh=ta kai\ parastai/h pro/frwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/n' ou)=n kiklh/|skw tw=nde daimo/nwn e)/ti;

sp.speaker: *danao/s
sp.l: o(rw= tri/ainan th/nde shmei=on qeou=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' eu)= t' e)/pemyen eu)= te deca/sqw xqoni/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)leuqe/rois nun e)sqla\ khrukeue/tw.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
l: se/besq': e)n a(gnw=| d' e(smo\s w(s peleia/dwn
o)/rniqos o)/rnis pw=s a)\n a(gneu/oi fagw/n;
pw=s d' a)\n gamw=n a)/kousan a)/kontos pa/ra
a(gno\s ge/noit' a)/n; ou)de\ mh\ 'n *(/aidou qanw\n
o(/pws a)\n u(mi=n pra=gos eu)= nika=| to/de.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: o(/pws de\ xw/ran ou)/te khru/kwn u(/po,
kla/doi ge me\n dh\ kata\ no/mous a)fikto/rwn
kei=ntai par' u(mi=n pro\s qeoi=s a)gwni/ois:
kai\ ta)/lla po/ll' e)/t' ei)ka/sai di/kaion h)=n,

l.#text: ei) mh\ paro/nti fqo/ggos h)=n o( shmanw=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)gw\ de\ pro\s se\ po/teron w(s e)/thn le/gw,
h)\ r(h/tor' i(erora/bdon, h)\ po/lews a)go/n;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: pro\s tau=t' a)mei/bou kai\ le/g' eu)qarsh\s e)moi/.
kai\ pa=san ai)=an, h(=s di' a(gno\s e)/rxetai
u(gra=s qala/sshs: tw=nde ta)pi\ ta/de kratw=.

l.#text: mnh/mhn pot' a)nti/misqon hu(/ret' e)n litai=s.
e)/xousa d' h)/dh ta)p' e)mou= tekmh/ria

l: ge/nos t' a)\n e)ceu/xoio kai\ le/gois pro/sw.
makra/n ge me\n dh\ r(h=sin ou) ste/rgei po/lis.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: braxu\s toro/s q' o( mu=qos: *)argei=ai ge/nos
kai\ tau=t' a)lhqh= pa/nta prosfu/sw lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: a)/pista muqei=sq', w)= ce/nai, klu/ein e)moi/,
ei) tocoteuxei=s h)=te, ka/rt' a)\n h)/|kasa
u(ma=s.  didaxqei\s <d'> a)\n to/d' ei)dei/hn ple/on,

l.#text: o(/pws ge/neqlon spe/rma t' *)argei=on to\ so/n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: h)=n w(s ma/lista, kai\ fa/tis pollh\ kratei=.

l.#text: mh\ kai\ lo/gos tis *zh=na meixqh=nai brotw=|;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ka)/krupta/ g' *(/hras tau=ta ta)mpala/gmata.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s ou)=n teleuta=| basile/wn nei/kh ta/de;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: bou=n th\n gunai=k' e)/qhken *)argei/a qeo/s.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: fasi/n, pre/ponta bouqo/rw| tau/rw| de/mas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ dh=ta pro\s tau=t' a)/loxos i)sxura\ *dio/s;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: to\n pa/nq' o(rw=nta fu/lak' e)pe/sthsen boi/+.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: poi=on pano/pthn oi)obouko/lon le/geis;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ ou)=n e)/teucen a)/llo duspo/tmw| boi/+;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: bohla/thn mu/wpa kinhth/rion.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: oi)=stron kalou=sin au)to\n oi( *nei/lou pe/las.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: toiga/r nin e)k gh=s h)/lasen makrw=|  dro/mw|.

l.#text: kai\ tau=t' e)/lecas pa/nta sugko/llws e)moi/.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kai\ mh\n *ka/nwbon ka)pi\ *me/mfin i(/keto.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ *zeu/s g' e)fa/ptwr xeiri\ fitu/ei go/non.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ti/s ou)=n o( *di=os po/rtis eu)/xetai boo/s;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: *libu/h, me/giston gh=s <pe/don> karpoume/nh.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ti/n' ou)=n e)/t' a)/llon th=sde blasthmo\n le/geis;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: *bh=lon di/paida pate/ra tou=d' e)mou= patro/s.

l.#text: to\ pa/nsofon nu=n o)/noma tou=to/ moi fra/son.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: *danao/s, a)delfo\s d' e)sti\ penthkonta/pais.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kai\ tou=d' a)/noige tou)/nom' a)fqo/nw| lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: po/nou d' i)/dois a)\n ou)damou= tau)to\n ptero/n:

l.#text: e)pei\ ti/s hu)/xei th/nd' a)ne/lpiston fugh\n

l: ke/lsein e)s *)/argos kh=dos e)ggene\s to\ pri/n,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: ti/ fh\s i(knei=sqai tw=nd' a)gwni/wn qew=n,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: po/tera kat' e)/xqran, h)\ to\ mh\ qe/mis le/geis;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/s d' a)\n fi/lous w)noi=to tou\s kekthme/nous;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: sqe/nos me\n ou(/tws mei=zon au)/cetai brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ dustuxou/ntwn g' eu)marh\s a)pallagh/.

l.#text: pw=s ou)=n pro\s u(ma=s eu)sebh\s e)gw\ pe/lw;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ai)tou=si mh\ 'kdou\s paisi\n *ai)gu/ptou pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: bare/a su/ g' ei)=pas, po/lemon a)/rasqai ne/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' h( di/kh ge cumma/xwn u(perstatei=.

sp.speaker: basileu/s
sp.l: ei)/per g' a)p' a)rxh=s pragma/twn koinwno\s h)=n.

l.#text: ai)dou= su\ pru/mnan po/leos w(=d' e)stemme/nhn.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: pe/frika leu/sswn ta/sd' e(/dras kataski/ous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: baru/s ge me/ntoi *zhno\s i(kesi/ou ko/tos.

l.#text: i)/de me ta\n i(ke/tin fuga/da peri/dromon,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: ei)/h d' a)/naton pra=gma tou=t' a)stoce/nwn.
nei=kos ge/nhtai: tw=n ga\r ou) dei=tai po/lis.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: su\ de\ par' o)yigo/nou ma/qe geraio/frwn:

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: e)mw=n.  to\ koino\n d' ei) miai/netai po/lis,
e)gw\ d' a)\n ou) krai/noim' u(po/sxesin pa/ros,
a)stoi=s de\ pa=si tw=nde koinw/sas pe/ri.

l.#text: su/ toi po/lis, su\ de\ to\ da/mion.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: a)/gos me\n ei)/h toi=s e)moi=s paligko/tois,
u(mi=n d' a)rh/gein ou)k e)/xw bla/bhs a)/ter.
ou)d' au)= to/d' eu)=fron, ta/sd' a)tima/sai lita/s.
a)mhxanw= de\ kai\ fo/bos m' e)/xei fre/nas

l.#text: dra=sai/ te mh\ dra=sai/ te kai\ tu/xhn e(lei=n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: ei)=nai, ti/s a)\n toi=sd' a)ntiwqh=nai qe/loi;

l.#text: dei= toi/ se feu/gein kata\ no/mous tou\s oi)/koqen,

l: w(s ou)k e)/xousin ku=ros ou)de\n a)mfi\ sou=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: mh/ ti/ pot' ou)=n genoi/man u(poxei/rios

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: ou)k eu)/kriton to\ kri=ma. mh/ m' ai(rou= krith/n.
ei)=pon de\ kai\ pri/n, ou)k a)/neu dh/mou ta/de
pra/caim' a)/n, ou)de/ per kratw=n, mh\ kai/ pote

l.#text: ei)/ph| lew/s, ei)/ pou/ ti mh\ toi=on tu/xoi,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)/dika me\n kakoi=s, o(/sia d' e)nno/mois.

l.#text: ti/ tw=nd' e)c i)/sou r(epome/nwn metal-

sp.speaker: *basileu/s

l.#text: o(/pws a)/nata tau=ta prw=ta me\n po/lei,

l: mh/t' e)n qew=n e(/draisin w(=d' i(drume/nas
o(\s ou)d' e)n *(/aidou to\n qano/nt' e)leuqeroi=.
mw=n ou) dokei= dei=n fronti/dos swthri/ou;

l.#text: sqei=san, w)= pa=n kra/tos e)/xwn xqono/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: mh/ ti tlh=|s ta\n i(ke/tin ei)sidei=n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: i)/sqi ga/r: paisi\ ta/de kai\ do/mois,

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: kai\ dh\ pe/frasmai. deu=ro d' e)coke/lletai.
h)\ toi=sin h)\ toi=s po/lemon ai)/resqai me/gan

l.#text: pa=s' e)/st' a)na/gkh, kai\ gego/mfwtai ska/fos

l: kai\ xrhma/twn me\n e)k do/mwn porqoume/nwn,
a)/thn ge mei/zw kai\ me/g' e)mplh/sas go/mou
kai\ glw=ssa toceu/sasa mh\ ta\ kai/ria,
o(/pws d' o(/maimon ai(=ma mh\ genh/setai,

l.#text: dei= ka/rta qu/ein kai\ pesei=n xrhsth/ria

l: h)= ka/rta nei/kous tou=d' e)/sw paroi/xomai
qe/lw d' a)/idris ma=llon h)\ sofo\s kakw=n
ei)=nai. ge/noito d' eu)= para\ gnw/mhn e)mh/n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: h)/kousa, kai\ le/gois a)/n. ou)/ me feu/cetai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/xw stro/fous zw/nas te, sullaba\s pe/plwn

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ta/x' a)\n gunaici\ tau=ta sumpreph= pe/loi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)k tw=nde toi/nun, i)/sqi, mhxanh\ kalh/

l.#text: le/con ti/n' au)dh\n th/nde ghruqei=s' e)/sh|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei) mh/ ti pisto\n tw=|d' u(posth/seis sto/lw|

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ti/ soi perai/nei mhxanh\ suzwma/twn;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ne/ois pi/naci bre/tea kosmh=sai ta/de.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: ai)nigmatw=des tou)/pos: a)ll' a(plw=s fra/son.

l.#text: e)k tw=nd' o(/pws ta/xist' a)pa/gcasqai qew=n.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: h)/kousa mastikth=ra kardi/as lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: cunh=kas: w)mma/twsa ga\r safe/steron.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: kakw=n de\ plh=qos potamo\s w(\s e)pe/rxetai:

l.#text: a)/ths d'  a)/busson pe/lagos ou) ma/l'  eu)/poron

l: ei) me\n ga\r u(mi=n mh\ to/d' e)kpra/cw xre/os,
ei) d' au)=q' o(mai/mois paisi\n *ai)gu/ptou se/qen

l.#text: staqei\s pro\ teixe/wn dia\ ma/xhs h(/cw te/lous,

l: i(kth=ros: u(/yistos ga\r e)n brotoi=s fo/bos.

l.#text: su\ me/n, pa/ter geraie\ tw=nde parqe/nwn,

l: kla/dous te tou/tous ai)=y' e)n a)gka/lais labw\n
qe/s, w(s i)/dwsi th=sd' a)fi/cews te/kmar

l.#text: e)mou=:  kat' a)rxh=s ga\r filai/tios lew/s.

l: kai\ ga\r ta/x' a)/n tis oi)kti/sas i)dw\n ta/de
u(mi=n d' a)\n ei)/h dh=mos eu)mene/steros:
toi=s h(/ssosin ga\r pa=s tis eu)noi/as fe/rei.

sp.speaker: *danao/s
l: cu/mpemyon, w(s a)\n tw=n polissou/xwn qew=n

l.#text: eu(/rwmen, a)sfa/leia d' h)=| di' a)/stews

l: stei/xousi: morfh=s d' ou)x o(mo/stolos fu/sis.
tre/fei.  fu/lacai mh\ qra/sos te/kh| fo/bon:
kai\ dh\ fi/lon tis e)/ktan' a)gnoi/as u(/po.

l.#text: stei/xoit' a)/n, a)/ndres: eu)= ga\r o( ce/nos le/gei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: tou/tw| me\n ei)=pas, kai\ tetagme/nos ki/oi:

l.#text: e)gw\ de\ pw=s drw=; pou= qra/sos ne/meis e)moi/;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: kla/dous me\n au)tou= lei=pe, shmei=on po/nou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ dh/ sfe lei/pw xeiri\ kai\ lo/gois se/qen.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: leuro\n kat' a)/lsos nu=n e)pistre/fou to/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ pw=s be/bhlon a)/lsos a)\n r(u/oito/ me;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ei) drako/ntwn dusfro/nwn e)xqi/osin;

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: eu)/fhmon ei)/h tou)/pos eu)fhmoume/nh|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)/toi ti qau=ma dusforei=n fo/bw| freno/s.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
sp.l: a)ei/ g' a)/narkto/n e)sti dei=m' e)cai/sion.

l.#text: su\ kai\ le/gwn eu)/fraine kai\ pra/sswn fre/na.

sp.speaker: *basileu/s
l: a)ll' ou)/ti daro\n xro/non e)rhmw/sei path/r.
stei/xw, to\ koino\n w(s a)\n eu)mene\s tiqw=:
kai\ so\n dida/cw pate/ra poi=a xrh\ le/gein.

l.#text: pro\s tau=ta mi/mne kai\ qeou\s e)gxwri/ous

l: litai=s paraitou= tw=n s' e)/rws e)/xei tuxei=n.
peiqw\ d' e(/poito kai\ tu/xh prakth/rios.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: brotoi\ d', oi(\ ga=s to/t' h)=san e)/nnomoi
ta\n d' au)= gunaiko/s: te/ras d' e)qa/mboun.

l: kai\ to/te dh\ ti/s h)=n o( qe/l-

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: *dio\s to/d' e)/rgon kai\ to/d' a)\n ge/nos le/gwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: u(p' a)rxa=s d' ou)/ tinos qoa/zwn

l: speu=sai/ ti tw=n bou/lios fe/rei frh/n.

l.#text: qarsei=te pai=des. eu)= ta\ tw=n e)gxwri/wn:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: w)= xai=re pre/sbu, fi/ltat' a)gge/llwn e)moi/
e)/nispe d' h(mi=n poi= keku/rwtai te/los,

sp.speaker: *danao/s
l: a)ll' w(/st' a)nhbh=sai/ me ghraia=| freni/:
kai\ mh/t' e)noi/kwn mh/t' e)phlu/dwn tina\
a)/gein: e)a\n de\ prostiqh=| to\ kartero/n,

l.#text: toia/nd' e)/peiqen r(h=sin a)mf' h(mw=n le/gwn

l: po/lin paxu=nai, ceniko\n a)stiko/n q' a(/ma
le/gwn diplou=n mi/asma pro\ po/lews fane\n
e)/kran' a)/neu klhth=ros w(s ei)=nai ta/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: eu)xa\s me\n ai)nw= ta/sde sw/fronas, fi/lai.

to\ ploi=on.  eu)/shmon ga\r ou)/ me lanqa/nei:

l.#text: pro\s pra=gm' o(rw/sas tw=nde mh\ a)melei=n qew=n.

i)/sws ga\r a)\n kh=ruc tis h)\ pre/sbh mo/loi,
